author: coheigea
msg: [WSS-91] - Removed new-lines from the security header in WSS4J
- All changes should be 100% backwards compatible. It should speed things up a bit as well.
- Note that xml-sec inserts newlines for signatures, so it isn't *fully* new-line free.
